mapper.select: SELECT BOM_ID , ITEM_ID , PARENT_ID , BOM_QUANTITY FROM BOM

SELECT BOM_DETAIL_ID AS BOM_DETAIL_ID , COMPONENT_ID AS COMPONENT_ID , UNIT AS UNIT , REQUIRED_AMOUNT AS REQUIRED_AMOUNT , BOM_ID AS BOM_ID FROM BOM_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1
AND BOM_ID = #{bom_id}
AND BOM_ID IS NULL
AND (BOM_DETAIL_ID LIKE concat('%', concat(#{searchKeyword}, '%')) OR ITEM_ID LIKE concat('%', concat(#{searchKeyword}, '%')))

SELECT ITEM_ID AS COMPONENT_ID , ITEM_NAME AS NAME , ITEM_UNIT AS UNIT , 'ITEM' AS TYPE FROM ITEM WHERE 1 = 1
AND #{type} = 'ITEM'
AND (ITEM_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
UNION ALL SELECT MATERIAL_ID AS COMPONENT_ID , MATERIAL_NAME AS NAME , UNIT AS UNIT , 'MATERIAL' AS TYPE FROM MATERIAL WHERE 1 = 1
AND #{type} = 'MATERIAL'
AND (MATERIAL_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR MATERIAL_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
